bibl.title: A Revised Chronology for the Coinage of Ptolemy I.
bibl.note: I. The consensus chronology. - II. Revised chronology of the Attic-weight coinage. - III. Early bronze coinage in the name of Ptolemy. - IV. Reduced-weight Palladion tetradrachms without corresponding gold: the plain and helmet series. - V. Reduced-weight Palladion tetradrachms without corresponding gold: [other] series. - VI. Chronology and process of Ptolemy's first metrological reform. - Pp. 61-64: Appendix. Implications of the new chronology for selected Attic-weight emissions.
bibl.seg: Catharine C. Lorber, A Revised Chronology for the Coinage of Ptolemy I.

I. The consensus chronology. - II. Revised chronology of the Attic-weight coinage. - III. Early bronze coinage in the name of Ptolemy. - IV. Reduced-weight Palladion tetradrachms without corresponding gold: the plain and helmet series. - V. Reduced-weight Palladion tetradrachms without corresponding gold: [other] series. - VI. Chronology and process of Ptolemy's first metrological reform. - Pp. 61-64: Appendix. Implications of the new chronology for selected Attic-weight emissions.
